private java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String path)
                            throws RestException
Return the element specified by the xpath

Parameters:
path - xpath of the element
Returns:
the object representing the element on the path, could be a string if the request is an attribute or text, or can be a RestResult if the request is an element

RestException
